POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: iotvideoindustry.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateRecordPlan
<公共请求参数>

{
    "PlanId": "plan-xxxxx",
    "Name": "xxxxxx",
    "TimeTemplateId": "tgrp-xxxxx",
    "EventId": 1,
    "IsModifyDevices": 1,
    "Devices": [
        {
            "DeviceId": "xxxx"
        }
    ]
}
UpdateRecordPlan.title: 更新录制计划

UpdateTimeTemplate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: iotvideoindustry.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateTimeTemplate
<公共请求参数>

{
    "IsAllWeek": 0,
    "TimeTemplateSpecs": [
        {
            "DayofWeek": 0,
            "EndTime": "xx",
            "BeginTime": "xx"
        }
    ],
    "Name": "xx",
    "TemplateId": "xxxx"
}
UpdateTimeTemplate.title: 更新时间模板
